ul.li: For "background-quantity", possible values are infinite | integer | inherit

body.p: If statement above is true, this paragraph should have an infinite (default) background quantity for its flag image. The rule applied is "p {background-quantity: ;}". body.h3: The background-quantity of this h3 heading should be 5 in the y-direction for the oval button. The rule applied is "h3 {background-quantity: 5;}". Also "h3 {background-repeat: repeat-y;}". h4.em: This emphasized text should have a background quantity of inherit for its flag pattern. The em element is immediately enclosed in an h4 element, which has the background quantity value of 2. The rule applied is "em {background-quantity: inherit;}". body.p: All other properties of this page should be UA-default. This is a paragraph, like the one above. However, it may not be long enougth to support a background image.
